alert.note: Alert for Barry; Jasper; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:18AM CDT until July 13 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NEWTON...NORTHWESTERN BARRY...SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES... At 117 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Sarcoxie to near Diamond to Picher, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Neosho, Monett, Seneca, Granby, Sarcoxie, Pierce City, Diamond, Loma Linda, Fairview, Fidelity, Newtonia, Pioneer, Stella, Wentworth, Stark City, Avilla, La Russell, Reeds, Ritchey and Racine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 5, and between mile markers 18 and 36. Interstate 49 between mile markers 16 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
